name: Colour Invaders
description:
A colour invader can only be destroyed by a bullet that matches its colour.

  • Tap / Click on either side of the launcher to move it there.
  • Wait for the launcher to be the right colour and tap it to launch a bullet.
  • If the bullet hits an invader that is the same colour the invader is destroyed.
  • If the bullet hits an invader that is a different colour then all the invaders will speed up.
  • Destroy them before they land on the launcher.
